## Checklist Before Merge
Please ensure the following before requesting a merge:

- [ ] Pull Request title is clear and follows the convention (`Feat:`, `Fix:`, etc.).
- [ ] Code has been tested locally and works as expected.
- [ ] Existing functionality is not broken.
- [ ] If `package.json` was modified, `package-lock.json` has also been updated.
- [ ] Branch name follows GitFlow conventions (`feature/`, `fix/`, etc.).
- [ ] Documentation is up to date (README, Notion, or inline comments).
- [ ] No sensitive information or secrets have been committed.
- [ ] At least **one reviewer** (not the author) has been assigned.
